review: I am very impressed with the Amazon FireTV Stick.  The set-up was easy.  I like the fact that not only can I use the remote that came with it, I can also set up my  smartphone as a remote.  I also like the compact size of the stick which makes it very convenient for me to use it with my second TV in my computer room.  Kudos to Amazon for this wonderful product!

review: I had a few difficulties starting the Stick? I found using the extender, even when it isn't needed works better.  Now it starts up quick. Allows easy searching while having  a simple remote. I wish more content was available. I would like to access my xfinity content, or the major networks, but these apps don't exist.So, the product does what you want. I can get to Netflix, Hulu plus, PBS, etc. quickly and efficiently. (Utlra fast! ) But, now I wish more was available. It is worth the price.
